summary: No overlaps or contradictions were found between the provided documents. The main document establishes the scope of EBA guidelines on expected credit losses for credit institutions, focusing on lending exposures. The related documents either reference and apply these guidelines to specific contexts like non-performing exposures, or they address different regulatory subjects, such as IFRS accounting standards for financial statement disclosure or the prudential definition of default for capital requirements. There are no instances of divergent or conflicting rules governing the exact same regulatory subject.
